/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street, lined with power lines and telephone poles, stretches out ahead, disappearing into the distance. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades adding a splash of color to the otherwise muted palette of the image. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. In the foreground, a few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the urban landscape.
